name: Computer Science Engineering
description: Focuses on programming, algorithms, data structures, and emerging technologies.
fullDescription: The CSE department provides strong fundamentals in data structures, algorithms, operating systems, networks, and full-stack development. Students gain exposure to various modern technologies such as AI, ML, and Cloud.

name: Information Technology
description: Dedicated to information systems, networking, and modern IT solutions.
fullDescription: The IT department focuses on software engineering, database systems, cybersecurity, and data analytics.

name: Electronics & Communication Engineering
description: Deals with electronic devices, circuits, and communication systems.
fullDescription: ECE students gain in-depth knowledge in embedded systems, communication engineering, digital electronics, and VLSI.

name: Mechanical Engineering
description: Covers machines, thermal engineering, and manufacturing processes.
fullDescription: The Mechanical Department focuses on thermodynamics, fluid mechanics, and machine design along with hands-on workshops.

name: Civil Engineering
description: Focused on construction, structural engineering, and surveying.
fullDescription: Civil Engineering provides expertise in building materials, structural design, geotechnical engineering, and environmental studies.

name: Master of Business Administration
description: Focused on leadership, management, finance, and marketing.
fullDescription: MBA department helps students build managerial, leadership, and analytical skills with specialization options.
